aboutFact.title: Who We Are
aboutFact.subtitle: FACT Center for Strategic Studies – Vision for Thinking, Solutions for the Future
aboutFact.description: Established in early 2025 in London under the leadership of former Jordanian Minister Wajih Azaizeh, FACT brings together an elite group of researchers and experts. It focuses on strategic issues related to asylum and displacement, particularly the Palestinian refugee issue and UNRWA. The center conducts in-depth research on international conflicts and crises, with special attention to the Arab-Israeli conflict, the legal and human rights dimensions of the refugee crisis, and strategies for conflict resolution and peacebuilding.
